title.narrative: Boosting Resilient and Inclusive Growth in The Bahamas II
N/A
N/A
Potenciación del Crecimiento Resiliente e Inclusivo en las Bahamas II

description.narrative: El objetivo de la operacion es promover el desarrollo resiliente, inclusivo y ambientalmente sostenible en las Bahamas a traves de: (i) promover la ciencia, innovacion y diversificacion economica en el sector productivo dentro de un marco ambientalemente sostenible; (ii) fortalecer y modernizar el clima de negocios; y (iii) modernizar el marco institucional para el crecimiento ambientalmente sostenible.

The objective of the operation is to promote resilient, inclusive, environmentally sustainable economic growth in The Bahamas through: (i) promoting science, innovation and economic diversification of the productive sector within a framework of environmental sustainability; (ii) strengthening and modernizing the business climate; and (iii) modernizing the institutional framework for environmentally sustainable growth.
Commitment in second quarter of 2021
Disbursement in second quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2021
